name: fxui
description: Functional, Declarative, Component-based UI Library that works with JSX

scripts.compile: tsc --outDir tmp && mkdir -p dist && cp -r tmp/source/* dist && rm -rf tmp
scripts.pub:preview: bun pub:stage && cd dist && bun publish --dry-run && cd ..
scripts.pub:patch: run-s clean compile ver:patch pub:stage && cd dist && bun publish --access public && cd ..
scripts.pub:minor: run-s clean compile ver:minor pub:stage && cd dist && bun publish --access public && cd ..
scripts.pub:major: run-s clean compile ver:major pub:stage && cd dist && bun publish --access public && cd ..
